revision.text: {{ArticleHistory |action1=PR |action1date=19:42, 24 March 2011 |action1link=Wikipedia:Peer review/RAF Northolt/archive1 |action1result=reviewed |action1oldid=420226337 |action2=GAN |action2date=16:38, 5 April 2011 |action2link=Talk:RAF Northolt/GA1 |action2result=listed |action2oldid=422394262 |action3=FAC |action3date=17:10, 30 May 2011 |action3link=Wikipedia:Featured article candidates/RAF Northolt/archive1 |action3result=promoted |action3oldid=431675405 |topic=History |currentstatus=FA |maindate=November 24, 2012 }} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WPAVIATION|Airports-project=yes|class=FA|importance=Mid}} {{WPLondon|importance=low|class=FA}} {{WP London Transport|importance=low|class=FA}} {{WPMILHIST|class=FA|Aviation=yes|British=yes|WWII=yes}} {{Talk Spoken Wikipedia|RAF Northolt 2006-03-30.ogg}} }} {{GOCE|name=Philg88|date=April 20, 2011}} {{Spoken Wikipedia request|[[User:Harrison49|Harrison49]] ([[User talk:Harrison49|talk]])|The last audio version of this article was created on 31 March 2006}} {{OnThisDay|date1=2012-05-03|oldid1=490505379}} ==Comment== 17.06.06 - Rougly 20 jets landed in Northolt Air Base, some surrounding a larger aircraft. Not important enough to go into article, + too little information. [[gamerunknown]] ==FA Review== A comment on the first picture. According to [[WP:WIAFA|''What is a featured article?'']] captions should be concise. Could we remove the names of the pilots to bring the caption down to an accetable length? On second thoughts the names could go into a reference or footnote. [[User:Philg88|► Philg88 ◄]] [[File:star.png|11px]][[User_talk:Philg88|talk]] 23:35, 19 April 2011 (UTC) :I've moved the names of the pilots to a new Footnotes section, and moved the photograph into the Battle of Britain section. [[User:Harrison49|Harrison49]] ([[User talk:Harrison49|talk]]) 13:38, 22 April 2011 (UTC) ==Spitfire with a Chipmunk Serial Nº?== The Spitfire 22 at the gate carried the serial number WP916, which seems to me to be actually a Chipmunk serial number. Can anyone confirm or deny? [[User:Paul Magnussen|Paul Magnussen]] ([[User talk:Paul Magnussen|talk]]) 16:49, 18 October 2012 (UTC) *PK624 did carry the serial WP916 during the 1960s but I believe it was repainted to the correct serial in 1963 when it was moved to Northolt. It moved on from Northolt in the late 60s for the Battle of Britain film. Not sure why it had the wrong serial but it may have been the only stencil they had at Uxbridge when it was re-painted. [[User:MilborneOne|MilborneOne]] ([[User talk:MilborneOne|talk]]) 19:45, 18 October 2012 (UTC) == Units of measurement == In opening sentences, units are very inconsistent. Land measurements in UK are generally given in miles, not a mixture of nautical miles kilometres. Equally, sixteenths of compass points are unnecessary, as is the direction and distance from another, not apprecviably better known, town once one location is given. Being [[WP:Bold|Bold]]. [[User:Kevin McE|Kevin McE]] ([[User talk:Kevin McE|talk]]) 09:11, 24 November 2012 (UTC) == commercial jets == We need to add the commercial jet use (run by city airport) in here somewhere. [[Special:Contributions/87.83.31.234|87.83.31.234]] ([[User talk:87.83.31.234|talk]]) 02:56, 5 March 2015 (UTC) :Do you have a reference for that, Northolt has been used by private aircraft for a long time, is this something different? [[User:MilborneOne|MilborneOne]] ([[User talk:MilborneOne|talk]]) 14:57, 5 March 2015 (UTC) ::[http://www.bailii.org/ew/cases/EWHC/Admin/2015/24.html Recent court case], [http://www.londonvipairport.com/ London VIP Airport], [http://www.forbes.com/sites/matthewstibbe/2013/01/21/london-vip-airport/ Forbes article], [http://www.londoncityairport.com/aboutandcorporate/page/northoltjetcentre City Airport's page]. [[Special:Contributions/87.83.31.234|87.83.31.234]] ([[User talk:87.83.31.234|talk]]) 23:51, 10 March 2015 (UTC) :From the [http://www.londonvipairport.com/docs/OperatingManual.pdf operations manual] it seems no scheduled or charter, maximum 29 PAX. [[Special:Contributions/87.83.31.234|87.83.31.234]] ([[User talk:87.83.31.234|talk]]) 00:34, 11 March 2015 (UTC)
